problem_text_cn: 如图,已知⊙O的半径为5,弦AB,CD所对的圆心角分别是∠AOB,∠COD,若∠AOB与∠COD互补,弦CD=6,则弦AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the radius of ⊙O is N_0, and the central angles of chord AB and CD are respectively ∠AOB and ∠COD. If ∠AOB and ∠COD are complementary, chord CD = N_1, then the length of chord AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,延长AO交⊙O于点E,连接BE,则∠AOB+∠BOE=180°,又∵∠AOB+∠COD=180°,∴∠BOE=∠COD,∴BE=CD=6,∵AE为⊙O的直径,∴∠ABE=90°,∴AB=√{AE^{2}-BE^{2}}=√{10^{2}-6^{2}}=8,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查圆心角定理,解题的关键是掌握圆心角定理和圆周角定理．
